  • Constructor Details

    • CBORDecoder

      public CBORDecoder(InputStream inputStream, boolean sequenceFlag, boolean lenientFlag, boolean rejectNaNFlag, Integer maxLength)
      Create a parameterized CBOR decoder.

      To be used with decodeWithOptions().

      Parameters:
      inputStream - Stream holding CBOR data. If sequenceFlag is false, inputStream must hold exactly one CBOR object.
      sequenceFlag - If sequenceFlag is true the following apply:
      • Immediately return after decoding a CBOR object, while preparing the decoder for the next item.
      • If no data is found (EOF), null is returned (empty sequences are permitted).
      • Note that data succeeding a just decoded CBOR object is not verified for correctness. Also see getByteCount().
      lenientFlag - If lenientFlag is true the decoder will accept CBOR code that does not conform to the Deterministic Encoding rules. This option may be needed for dealing with "legacy" CBOR implementations. The flag disables the map sorting and preferred number serialization requirements. See also CBORMap.setSortingMode(boolean).
      rejectNaNFlag - By default, this implementation supports NaN, Infinity, and -Infinity. In case these variants are not applicable for the application in question, they can be "outlawed" (causing a CBORException if encountered), by setting rejectNaNFlag to true.
      maxLength - Holds maximum input size in bytes or null (Integer.MAX_VALUE is assumed). Since malformed CBOR objects can request arbitrary amounts of memory, it is highly recommended setting maxLength to a value that is adapted to the actual application.

  • Method Details

    • decodeWithOptions

      public CBORObject decodeWithOptions()
      Decode CBOR data with options.

      Also see CBORSequenceBuilder.

      Decoding errors throw CBORException.

      Returns:
      CBORObject or null (for EOF sequences only).

    • getByteCount

      public int getByteCount()
      Get decoder byte count.

      This is equivalent to the position of the next item to be read.

      Returns:
      The number of bytes read so far.

    • decode

      public static CBORObject decode(byte[] cbor)
      Decode CBOR data.

      This method is identical to: 

        new CBORDecoder(new ByteArrayInputStream(cbor),
                  false, 
                  false,
                  false,
                  cborData.length).decodeWithOptions();

      Decoding errors throw CBORException.

      Parameters:
      cbor - CBOR binary data holding exactly one CBOR object.
      Returns:
      CBORObject
